title: Tube XXI
tagline: Watch Movies, Series, and Anime Streaming Download Free
description: Watch and download the latest movies, series, and anime. Free multi-sub streaming, HD quality. Available in Korean dramas, anime, Western films, and a complete Asian selection!
first_tagline_video_description: Watch the first video of Tube XXI to see how it works.

contact_us_description: Get in touch with {site_name}. We're here to help with your questions, feedback, and news tips.
subject: Subject
contact_news_tips_description: Have a breaking news tip or story idea? We want to hear from you.
contact_press_inquiries_description: For media and press related inquiries, please contact our press office.
contact_follow_us_description: Stay connected with {site_name} on social media for the latest updates.
about_us_description: Learn more about {site_name} and our mission to make watching & downloading movies easier..
faq_description: Find answers to common questions about {site_name}.
privacy_policy_description: Learn about how we protect your personal information and privacy.
terms_of_service_description: Review the rules and regulations for using {site_name}.
faq_answer_1: {site_name} supports various types of Movies, Series, Drama and Anime collections. We are constantly updating our library to include the latest releases and popular titles across different genres.
faq_answer_2: Yes, {site_name} is completely free to use. We do not charge any fees for downloading videos.
faq_answer_3: Yes, you can download the videos from our platform. However, please ensure you have the necessary permissions and adhere to the platform's terms of service.
faq_question_4: Are there any limitations on the number of downloads and watching?
faq_answer_4: No, our platform does not have any view or download limits to prevent abuse. Please check the platform's terms of service for specific restrictions.
faq_answer_5: Yes, {site_name} is committed to providing the latest movies and series. We regularly update our library to include new releases and popular titles across various genres.
faq_answer_6: Yes, {site_name} is available on mobile devices. You can download videos directly from your mobile browser or download our mobile app.
faq_question_7: Can I use {site_name} without creating an account?
faq_answer_7: Yes, you can use {site_name} without creating an account. However, some features may be limited without an account.
about_mission_statement_point_1: At {site_name}, our mission is to make watching videos easy and accessible to everyone. We are dedicated to providing a reliable and efficient platform for users to watch their favorite videos from various platforms.
about_mission_statement_point_2: We strive to provide a user-friendly platform that makes it simple to watch videos. Our goal is to empower users to access and enjoy videos without any hassle.
about_mission_statement_point_3: By using {site_name}, you can enjoy the experience of watching various videos.
about_mission_statement_point_4: Whether you're a casual user or a professional content creator, {site_name} has got you covered.
about_mission_statement_point_5: Join us today and start watching your favorite videos easily!
about_history_description: Founded in {year}, {site_name} has become a leading for watching video  platform, empowering users worldwide to easily access and enjoy videos.
about_history_description_2: Over the years, we have expanded our reach to support a diverse range of video platforms, including YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, and more.
about_history_description_3: Today, {site_name} continues to be a trusted source for videos, with millions of users worldwide.
about_history_description_4: We are committed to providing the best possible experience for our users, whether they are watching individual videos or bulk content.
about_history_description_5: With our user-friendly interface and robust features, we aim to make video watching a hassle-free and enjoyable experience for all our users.
about_values_point_1: User-Friendliness: We prioritize simplicity and ease of use in our platform, ensuring that users can watch videos effortlessly.
about_values_point_2: Privacy and Security: We take the privacy and security of our users' personal information seriously. We implement robust measures to protect their data.
about_values_point_3: Transparency: We believe in transparent practices, providing users with clear information about the video watching process and any associated fees.
about_values_point_4: Community Engagement: We value our users' feedback and actively engage with them to improve our platform. We encourage users to participate in the community and share their experiences.
about_values_point_5: Innovation: We are committed to staying ahead of the curve in the video watching industry. We continuously innovate to provide our users with the latest features and improvements.
privacy_policy_introduction_description: At {site_name}, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our platform.
privacy_policy_personal_information_desc: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number when you register on {site_name} or use our platform. This information is used to provide you with a personalized experience and to improve our services.
privacy_policy_usage_data_description: We may collect usage data such as your IP address, browser type, and device information when you use our platform. This data is used to analyze trends, improve our services, and ensure a smooth user experience.
privacy_policy_cookies_description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience on {site_name}. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device. They help us understand how you use our platform and improve our services.
privacy_policy_cookies_types_description: We use different types of cookies to enhance your experience on {site_name}. Some cookies are necessary for the platform to function properly, while others help us improve performance and provide personalized features.
You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings. By default, most browsers allow cookies to be stored. However, you can choose to disable cookies if you prefer.
privacy_policy_data_storage_description: We take the security of your personal information seriously. All data is stored securely on our servers and is protected with industry-standard encryption technologies.
privacy_policy_data_storage_description_: We implement strict security measures to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration of your personal information.
Your data is stored in a secure environment and is accessed only by authorized personnel. We take appropriate measures to safeguard your data from unauthorized access.
We limit access to your personal information to the necessary extent required to perform the services you have requested. Any data shared with third parties is subject to strict security measures.
We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
By using {site_name}, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not consent, please do not use our platform.
If you have any questions or concerns about our data storage and security practices, please contact us.
privacy_policy_advertisement_description: We may display advertisements on {site_name} to support our platform and generate revenue. These advertisements are based on your browsing history and preferences. You can opt out of ad personalization in your account settings.
privacy_policy_data_retention_descriptio: We may retain your personal information for a certain period of time, as required by applicable laws. This data retention period is subject to change, and we will notify you if your data is subject to any retention period.
We may retain your personal information for a longer period if required by law or for legitimate business purposes. In such cases, we will notify you before permanently deleting your data.
We may retain your personal information for a longer period if required by law or for legitimate business purposes. In such cases, we will notify you before permanently deleting your data.
If you have any questions or concerns about our data retention practices, please contact us.
By using {site_name}, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not consent, please do not use our platform.
If you have any questions or concerns about our data retention practices, please contact us.
privacy_policy_contact_description: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us using the information provided below.
terms_introduction_description: Welcome to {site_name}'s Terms of Service. These Terms of Service govern your use of our platform and outline the rules and regulations that apply to your use of the platform. By using {site_name}, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service.
terms_acceptance_description: By using {site_name}, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these Terms of Service, please do not use our platform.
terms_usage_description: You agree to use {site_name} only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe the rights of, or restrict or inhibit the use of, any third party.
terms_usage_description_2: You agree not to use {site_name} for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms of Service.
terms_usage_description_3: You agree not to use {site_name} to collect or store any personal information from any third party without their prior consent.
terms_usage_description_4: You agree not to use {site_name} for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms of Service.
terms_usage_description_5: You agree not to use {site_name} to collect or store any personal information from any third party without their prior consent.
terms_usage_description_6: You agree not to use {site_name} for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms of Service.
terms_content_and_intellectual_property_: All content on {site_name}, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of {site_name} or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without our prior written consent.
You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without our prior written consent.
By submitting content to our Services (such as comments or user submissions), you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, and worldwide license to use, modify, and distribute such content.
We respect intellectual property rights and will respond to notices of alleged copyright infringement in accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA).
terms_privacy_description: Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.
terms_disclaimer_description: By using {site_name}, you agree that we are not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of your use of the platform. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any content provided on the platform.
terms_disclaimer_description_2: We do not warrant that our Services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components. We make no representations about the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of our content.
terms_contact_description: If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms of Service, please contact us using the information provided below.
terms_limitation_description: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the platform.
terms_limitation_description_2: Our total liability for any claims arising from or relating to these Terms or our Services shall not exceed $100.
terms_termination_description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the platform at any time, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms of Service.
terms_termination_description_2: Upon termination, your right to use our Services will cease immediately. The provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination shall survive, including ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, and limitations of liability.
terms_gover_law_description: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of {country}, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms_gover_law_description_2: Any action or proceeding arising out of or relating to these Terms of Service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of {country}.
privacy_policy_your_right_description: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal information that we collect. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.
privacy_policy_children_description: We do not knowingly collect or maintain personal information from children under the age of 13. If you believe that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 13, please contact us using the information provided below.
privacy_policy_children_description_2: If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.
privacy_policy_international_description: {site_name} is based in the United States. If you are accessing our services from outside the United States, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States, where our servers are located and our central database is operated.
The data protection laws of the United States may not be as comprehensive as those in your country. By using our services, you consent to the transfer of your information to the United States.

If you are located in the European Union, we process your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We rely on various legal bases for processing, including consent, contract performance, and legitimate interests.
privacy_policy_changes_description: We reserve the right to update or modify our Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. We encourage you to review our Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your personal information.
privacy_policy_changes_description_2: Your continued use of our services after the effective date of the updated Privacy Policy constitutes your acceptance of the changes.
